publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2514 Irene McGugan: Tartan Army Award-That the Parliament congratulates the Tartan Army on winning the Belgian Olympic Committee's Fair Play Prize 2001 for the excellent behaviour displayed by Scotland fans in Brussels when visiting for the Belgium v Scotland world cup qualifier in September; notes that this award is the latest in a string of accolades bestowed on Scottish football fans; further notes that a record 15,000 Scotland supporters travelled to the match; commends those supporters for the good name they give Scotland throughout the world, and looks forward to the presentation of the award to representatives of the Scotland Travel Club and the SFA in Brussels on 7 December 2001.
S1M-2514 Tartan Army Award (lodged on 4 December 2001) Michael Matheson*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S1M-2514 Tartan Army Award (lodged on 4 December 2001) Michael Russell*

S1M-2514 Irene McGugan: Tartan Army Award-That the Parliament congratulates the Tartan Army on winning the Belgian Olympic Committee's Fair Play Prize 2001 for the excellent behaviour displayed by Scotland fans in Brussels when visiting for the Belgium v Scotland world cup qualifier in September; notes that this award is the latest in a string of accolades bestowed on Scottish football fans; further notes that a record 15,000 Scotland supporters travelled to the match; commends those supporters for the good name they give Scotland throughout the world, and looks forward to the presentation of the award to representatives of the Scotland Travel Club and the SFA in Brussels on 7 December 2001. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Fergus Ewing, Mr Andrew Welsh, Michael Russell, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2514 Tartan Army Award (lodged on 4 December 2001) Tommy Sheridan*, Christine Grahame*, Shona Robison*
S1M-2514 Tartan Army Award (lodged on 4 December 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Brian Adam*, Linda Fabiani*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2514 Tartan Army Award (lodged on 4 December 2001) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2514 Tartan Army Award (lodged on 4 December 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2514 Tartan Army Award (lodged on 4 December 2001) Colin Campbell*
S1M-2514 Tartan Army Award (lodged on 4 December 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2514 Tartan Army Award (lodged on 4 December 2001) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
